1 LINK

Base styles/objects. Mostly global, tag-based selector rules.

1.1 Base

1.2 Link Complex

Separation of components within a standard hyperlink.

Complex Link > 
<a href="#" class="link-complex"><span class="link-complex__target">Complex Link</span> ></a>

1.3 Link Blocky

Links with button-like blockyness but without the button UI styles

Blocky Link 
<a href="#" class="link-blocky">Blocky Link</a>
